casebody.data:
Robert W. CLARK and Debra L. Clark
v.
Bobby Lee McARTHUR, Deborah H. McArthur, Fred W. Lee, Jr. and wife, Carol E. Lee, John Henry Lee and wife, Patricia N. Lee. No. 557P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. James M. Cooper, for Bobby Lee & Deborah McArthur. H. Terry Hutchens, Fayetteville, for Clark.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendants (Bobby Lee McArthur and Deborah H. McArthur) on the 28th day of October 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of March 2005."
